settings.hero_heading: Start selling where customers are already shopping
settings.hero_body: Launch your business on the store trusted by millions of customers worldwide. Access powerful tools, reach new shoppers, and grow your brand with Amazon.
settings.hero_disclaimer: Plans start at $39.99 a month + selling fees.
settings.hero_stat_caption: of sales on Amazon come from independent sellers
settings.feature_subheading: Empower your business with a suite of tools designed to help you start, manage, and scale on Amazon.
settings.testimonial_quote: “We launched our brand on Amazon and reached customers we never thought possible. The tools made it easy to scale quickly.”
settings.pricing_heading: Flexible pricing that grows with you
settings.pricing_body: Subscribe to the Professional selling plan for $39.99 per month plus selling fees. Additional programs like FBA, advertising, and brand services are available when you need them.
settings.cta_body: Join thousands of entrepreneurs growing with Amazon every day. Sign up in minutes and start selling today.
settings.footer_legal: © 2024 Amazon Services LLC. All rights reserved.

settings.title: List with ease
settings.body: Get step-by-step guidance to create product listings, set pricing, and manage inventory from one dashboard.

settings.title: Reach more customers
settings.body: Tap into Amazon's global customer base and deliver prime-worthy experiences with fast, reliable fulfillment options.

settings.title: Grow with insights
settings.body: Use built-in analytics to understand trends, optimize ads, and make smarter business decisions.

settings.title: Protect your brand
settings.body: Access tools that help you register your brand, safeguard listings, and build trust with shoppers.

settings.title: Create your account
settings.body: Tell us about your business, choose a selling plan, and verify your identity to get started.

settings.title: List your products
settings.body: Add products individually or in bulk and showcase what makes your brand unique.

settings.title: Deliver delight
settings.body: Ship orders yourself or let Fulfillment by Amazon handle storage, packing, and shipping for you.

settings.title: Grow your business
settings.body: Advertise, offer deals, and expand globally with programs built for brands of every size.

settings.title: Explore seller resources
settings.body: Learn from successful entrepreneurs, discover best practices, and unlock insights from Amazon experts.

settings.title: Watch on-demand webinars
settings.body: Dive deep into selling strategies, growth tactics, and product updates through engaging sessions.

settings.title: Connect with support
settings.body: Get personalized help from specialists, community forums, and round-the-clock seller assistance.
